item.title: Post a file to Flask by Curl via API
item.description: Curl is widely used in command lines or scripts to transfer data. Different ways to use curl to post a file to a web server with samples (from both client-side and server: Python-Flask side) will be discussed because it took me a while on the server-side to receiving the data from client. I would like to add samples of Python-requests, Postman later. Started with macOS Mojave Python 3.
